pullRequest.title: Add a test for regex usage to runtime fields
pullRequest.bodyText:
Now that we've got regexes enabled by default (#63029) this adds a test
to runtime fields just to make sure that it works with regexes. It does,
but this adds a test to make sure it continues to work.

commit.message:
Add a test for regex usage to runtime fields

Now that we've got regexes enabled by default (#63029) this adds a test
to runtime fields just to make sure that it works with regexes. It does,
but this adds a test to make sure it continues to work.

nodes.bodyText: out of curiosity, what happens when matches returns false for a doc? the runtime field wont have any value thats it?
